item.title: Project 2: Modeling, Testing, Predicting
item.description: Introduction Main Variable Introduction The data set chosen was “pbc”. This data set contains information on a Mayo Clinic Trial for a Primary Biliary Cirrhosis (PBC) treatment. The set originally contained 418 observations, with each observation representing a patient involved in the trial. Any observation containing NAs were removed for the sake of simplicity, leaving 276 observations. During this trial, patients were either given the treatment, consiting of D-Penacillamine, or a placebo at random, and then different values and observations were tested and recorded.

item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: Introduction The first data set chosen was “GDP”. This data set contains information on the Gross Domestic Product (in billions) for the United States by quarter since 1947. The second data set chosen was “Unemployment”. This data set contains information on the unemployment rate (percentage) in the United States by year since 1948. The third data set chosen was “Presidents”. This data set contains a list of United States preisdent by year since 1947.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects Here are some projects I have recently completed: Exploratory Data Analysis with Tidyverse Tools Modeling, Testing, and Classification

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
